base_description: Rectangular black object, elongated and angled.
part_description: Single solid piece, rectangular shape, uniform black color, angled ends.
internal_interaction_description: The object is a single, solid piece with no distinct internal parts. Its uniform shape suggests no internal movement or interaction between parts, maintaining structural integrity across its form.
external_interaction_description: The object may serve as a structural component or support, interacting with other objects by providing a stable base or connector. Its elongated shape allows it to span or connect spaces, potentially used in construction or assembly with other modular pieces.
